name: TrashtagTheGame
description:
Trashtag the Game is about one of the most important things when you  go outside — to keep world around you clean as it was before. And it will be fun!

Game includes:
-3D low poly graphics
-Easy controls: tap on trash to pick it up and swipe to throw
-2 game modes:
     *Realistic: one urn and wind that trying to bother your throws
     *Sorting: 3 urns for Paper, Plastic and Organic trash, throw carefully!
-23 unlockable skins for urn in Realistic mode.
-4 different locations
-4 difficulties
